trans-unit.source: Learn how to use tiles, badges, toasts, and notifications to provide entry points into your app and keep users up-to-date.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use tiles, badges, toasts, and notifications to provide entry points into your app and keep users up-to-date.

trans-unit.source: Tiles, badges, and notifications
trans-unit.target: Tiles, badges, and notifications

trans-unit.source: Tiles, badges, and notifications for UWP apps
trans-unit.target: Tiles, badges, and notifications for UWP apps

trans-unit.source: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132)
trans-unit.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132)

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use tiles, badges, toasts, and notifications to provide entry points into your app and keep users up-to-date.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use tiles, badges, toasts, and notifications to provide entry points into your app and keep users up-to-date.

trans-unit.source: Every app has a tile.
trans-unit.target: Every app has a tile.

trans-unit.source: A tile is an app's representation on the Start menu.
trans-unit.target: A tile is an app's representation on the Start menu.

trans-unit.source: You can enable different tile sizes (small, medium, wide, and large).
trans-unit.target: You can enable different tile sizes (small, medium, wide, and large).

trans-unit.source: You can use a tile notification to update the tile to communicate new information to the user, such as news headlines, or the subject of the most recent unread message.
trans-unit.target: You can use a tile notification to update the tile to communicate new information to the user, such as news headlines, or the subject of the most recent unread message.

trans-unit.source: You can use a badge, or notification badge to provide status or summary info in the form of a system-provided glyph or a number from 1-99.
trans-unit.target: You can use a badge, or notification badge to provide status or summary info in the form of a system-provided glyph or a number from 1-99.

trans-unit.source: A toast notification is a notification that your app sends to the user via a pop-up UI element called a toast (or banner).
trans-unit.target: A toast notification is a notification that your app sends to the user via a pop-up UI element called a toast (or banner).

trans-unit.source: The notification can be seen whether the user is in your app or not.
trans-unit.target: The notification can be seen whether the user is in your app or not.

trans-unit.source: A push notification or raw notification is a notification sent to your app either from Windows Push Notification Services (WNS) or from a background task.
trans-unit.target: A push notification or raw notification is a notification sent to your app either from Windows Push Notification Services (WNS) or from a background task.

trans-unit.source: Your app can respond to these notifications either by notifying the user that something of interest happened (via badge update, tile update, or toast) or it can respond in any way of your choice.
trans-unit.target: Your app can respond to these notifications either by notifying the user that something of interest happened (via badge update, tile update, or toast) or it can respond in any way of your choice.

trans-unit.source: Tiles
trans-unit.target: Tiles

trans-unit.source: Topic
trans-unit.target: Topic

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Create tiles
trans-unit.target: Create tiles

trans-unit.source: Customize the default tile for your app and provide assets for different screen sizes.
trans-unit.target: Customize the default tile for your app and provide assets for different screen sizes.

trans-unit.source: Create adaptive tiles
trans-unit.target: Create adaptive tiles

trans-unit.source: Adaptive tile templates are a new feature in Windows 10, allowing you to design your own tile notification content using a simple and flexible markup language that adapts to different screen densities.
trans-unit.target: Adaptive tile templates are a new feature in Windows 10, allowing you to design your own tile notification content using a simple and flexible markup language that adapts to different screen densities.

trans-unit.source: This article tells you how to create adaptive live tiles for your Universal Windows Platform (UWP) app.
trans-unit.target: This article tells you how to create adaptive live tiles for your Universal Windows Platform (UWP) app.

trans-unit.source: Adaptive tiles schema
trans-unit.target: Adaptive tiles schema

trans-unit.source: Here are the elements and attributes you use to create adaptive tiles.
trans-unit.target: Here are the elements and attributes you use to create adaptive tiles.

trans-unit.source: Special tile templates
trans-unit.target: Special tile templates

trans-unit.source: Special tile templates are unique templates that are either animated, or just allow you to do things that aren't possible with adaptive tiles.
trans-unit.target: Special tile templates are unique templates that are either animated, or just allow you to do things that aren't possible with adaptive tiles.

trans-unit.source: App icon assets
trans-unit.target: App icon assets

trans-unit.source: App icon assets, which appear in a variety of forms throughout the Windows 10 operating system, are the calling cards for your Universal Windows Platform (UWP) app.
trans-unit.target: App icon assets, which appear in a variety of forms throughout the Windows 10 operating system, are the calling cards for your Universal Windows Platform (UWP) app.

trans-unit.source: These guidelines detail where app icon assets appear in the system, and provide in-depth design tips on how to create the most polished icons.
trans-unit.target: These guidelines detail where app icon assets appear in the system, and provide in-depth design tips on how to create the most polished icons.

trans-unit.source: Notifications
trans-unit.target: Notifications

trans-unit.source: Topic
trans-unit.target: Topic

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Adaptive and interactive toast notifications
trans-unit.target: Adaptive and interactive toast notifications

trans-unit.source: Adaptive and interactive toast notifications let you create flexible pop-up notifications with more content, optional inline images, and optional user interaction.
trans-unit.target: Adaptive and interactive toast notifications let you create flexible pop-up notifications with more content, optional inline images, and optional user interaction.

trans-unit.source: Notifications Visualizer
trans-unit.target: Notifications Visualizer

trans-unit.source: Notifications Visualizer is a new Universal Windows Platform (UWP) app in [the Store](https://www.microsoft.com/store/apps/notifications-visualizer/9nblggh5xsl1) that helps developers design adaptive live tiles for Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: Notifications Visualizer is a new Universal Windows Platform (UWP) app in [the Store](https://www.microsoft.com/store/apps/notifications-visualizer/9nblggh5xsl1) that helps developers design adaptive live tiles for Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: Choose a notification delivery method
trans-unit.target: Choose a notification delivery method

trans-unit.source: This article covers the four notification options—local, scheduled, periodic, and push—that deliver tile and badge updates and toast notification content.
trans-unit.target: This article covers the four notification options—local, scheduled, periodic, and push—that deliver tile and badge updates and toast notification content.

trans-unit.source: Send a local tile notification
trans-unit.target: Send a local tile notification

trans-unit.source: This article describes how to send a local tile notification to a primary tile and a secondary tile using adaptive tile templates.
trans-unit.target: This article describes how to send a local tile notification to a primary tile and a secondary tile using adaptive tile templates.

trans-unit.source: Periodic notification overview
trans-unit.target: Periodic notification overview

trans-unit.source: Periodic notifications, which are also called polled notifications, update tiles and badges at a fixed interval by downloading content from a cloud service.
trans-unit.target: Periodic notifications, which are also called polled notifications, update tiles and badges at a fixed interval by downloading content from a cloud service.

trans-unit.source: Windows Push Notification Services (WNS) overview
trans-unit.target: Windows Push Notification Services (WNS) overview

trans-unit.source: The Windows Push Notification Services (WNS) enables third-party developers to send toast, tile, badge, and raw updates from their own cloud service.
trans-unit.target: The Windows Push Notification Services (WNS) enables third-party developers to send toast, tile, badge, and raw updates from their own cloud service.

trans-unit.source: This provides a mechanism to deliver new updates to your users in a power-efficient and dependable way.
trans-unit.target: This provides a mechanism to deliver new updates to your users in a power-efficient and dependable way.

trans-unit.source: Code generated by the push notification wizard
trans-unit.target: Code generated by the push notification wizard

trans-unit.source: By using a wizard in Visual Studio, you can generate push notifications from a mobile service that was created with Azure Mobile Services.
trans-unit.target: By using a wizard in Visual Studio, you can generate push notifications from a mobile service that was created with Azure Mobile Services.

trans-unit.source: The Visual Studio wizard generates code to help you get started.
trans-unit.target: The Visual Studio wizard generates code to help you get started.

trans-unit.source: This topic explains how the wizard modifies your project, what the generated code does, how to use this code, and what you can do next to get the most out of push notifications.
trans-unit.target: This topic explains how the wizard modifies your project, what the generated code does, how to use this code, and what you can do next to get the most out of push notifications.

trans-unit.source: See [Windows Push Notification Services (WNS) overview](tiles-and-notifications-windows-push-notification-services--wns--overview.md).
trans-unit.target: See [Windows Push Notification Services (WNS) overview](tiles-and-notifications-windows-push-notification-services--wns--overview.md).

trans-unit.source: Raw notification overview
trans-unit.target: Raw notification overview

trans-unit.source: Raw notifications are short, general purpose push notifications.
trans-unit.target: Raw notifications are short, general purpose push notifications.

trans-unit.source: They are strictly instructional and do not include a UI component.
trans-unit.target: They are strictly instructional and do not include a UI component.

trans-unit.source: As with other push notifications, the WNS feature delivers raw notifications from your cloud service to your app.
trans-unit.target: As with other push notifications, the WNS feature delivers raw notifications from your cloud service to your app.
